Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th Street/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses are temp rerouted via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island and 67th, due to police activity near 67th Street/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stoney Island, then resume their normal on 67th, due to police activity near 67th Street/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delay near Logan Square
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Logan Square due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Logan Square due to debris on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
